title: Surya Kiran Kundanalu: Diamond & Gemstone Stud Earrings
materials: Emerald Center Stone. Features a signature Hyderabadi Gold Polish for a rich luster.
features: Intricate geometric design inspired by the sun's rays. Each facet is adorned with meticulously set diamonds, framed by vibrant ruby accents. The central Emerald adds a touch of regal elegance. The setting is expertly crafted to maximize light reflection, enhancing the sparkle of the diamonds.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for occasions like birthdays
description: A stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. These earrings showcase exceptional craftsmanship and the finest quality gemstones. The unique sunburst motif represents prosperity and joy. Durable and timeless, these kundanalu are an investment piece to be cherished for generations.
